SELECT DISTINCT
FROM aos_module, aos_role_module WHERE aos_module.id_ = aos_role_module.module_id_ AND aos_module.is_enable_ = '1' AND aos_role_module.grant_type_ = #{grant_type_} AND aos_role_module.role_id_ IN ( SELECT role_id_ FROM aos_user_role WHERE user_id_ = #{user_id_} )
AND ${fnLength}(aos_module.cascade_id_) = ${length}
AND aos_module.cascade_id_ like '${cascade_id_}%'
ORDER BY aos_module.sort_no_ ASC
